description: The pilot reports entering the downwind leg of the traffic pattern.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Beginning of downwind
calls.message: {Call Sign}, we are beginning of downwind Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report end of downwind
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report end of downwind Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report end of downwind
calls.message: Will report end of downwind Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports turning onto the base leg.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Turning base
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, we are turning base leg.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report final
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report final for Rwy-16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report final
calls.message: Will report final for Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a full stop landing and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for full stop
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, S/W 210/08 kts, clear for full stop.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared to land
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared to land Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a touch & go and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for touch & go
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for touch & go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for touch & go
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, S/W 210/08 kts, clear for touch & go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared for touch & go
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared for touch & go Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a low go and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for low go
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for low go.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared for low go
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, check gears down and locked, S/W 210/08 kts, clear for low go.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared for low go
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared for low go Rwy-16, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on the downwind leg with the intention of a full-stop landing.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Downwind for full stop
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, downwind for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report final
calls.message: {Call Sign}, report final.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report final
calls.message: Will report final, {Call Sign}.

description: The pilot reports on final for a full stop landing and receives clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for full stop
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for full stop.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: {Call Sign}, check gears down and locked, surface wind 160/07 knots, cleared to land Runway 16.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared to land
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared to land Runway 16, {Call Sign}.

description: The helicopter pilot reports on the downwind leg.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Downwind
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, downwind.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Report final for R-P
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, report final for R-P.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm report final
calls.message: Will report final for R-P, {Call Sign}.

description: The helicopter pilot reports on final for R-P and receives landing clearance.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Final for R-P
calls.message: {JSR TWR}, {Call Sign}, final for R-P.

calls.speaker: TWR
calls.caption: Cleared to land
calls.message: {Call Sign}, {JSR TWR}, surface wind 180 at 05 knots, cleared to land at R-P.

calls.speaker: Pilot
calls.caption: Confirm cleared to land
calls.message: Wind copied, cleared to land, {Call Sign}.
